testcase.name: Create Organization
testcase.system-out: Given Launch browser and enter Vtiger CRM url...............................passed And Login to Vtiger CRM application.........................................passed When User clicks on Organization tab........................................passed And Clicks on Plus button...................................................passed And Enters name and industry and clicks on save button......................passed Then New Organization Info page is displayed................................passed When User click on organizations link.......................................passed Then New organization appears on the list...................................passed And User logs out of the application and closes the browser.................passed
